item.title: JLL opens new UK headquarters at 1 Broadgate
item.description: JLL has relocated 1,200 staff into a new 190,0 sq ft headquarters at 1 Broadgate, developed by British Land.

item.title: Derwent London begins refurbishment of Fitzroy Street offices
item.description: Derwent London has commenced a full refurbishment of its 110,000 sq ft Fitzrovia office block to create modern workspace.
